Propaganda.help: The Telepathist has affected the minds of the citizens observing the assault on TPN and has turned them against you. Citizens affected by a Telepathists propaganda will attack using a variety of means at their disposal.
Propaganda.targetHelp: The Telepathist has affected the minds of the citizens observing the assault on TPN and has turned them against you. Citizens affected by a Telepathists propaganda will attack using a variety of means at their disposal.

Pacify.help: You maintain a continual aura of pacification, reducing the combat effectiveness of enemy targets.
Pacify.targetHelp: The Telepathists maintain a continual aura of pacification, reducing the combat effectiveness of enemy targets. While under the effects of pacification, your defenses, resistances, damage and chance to hit are all negatively impacted.

Telepathic_Interference.help: You maintain a field of interference around you which damages the neural pathways of enemies. Those around you take continual damage over time.
Telepathic_Interference.targetHelp: The Telepathist maintains a continuous localized aura which damages the neural pathways of her enemies. You suffer continuous psionic damage while in the aura's field.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} strikes you for {Damage} points of psionic damage.
